oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Community Federal Savings and Loan Association ribbon cutting ceremony, Nashville, Tennessee, 1962 February 28
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photo relates to the February 28th, 1962 ribbon cutting ceremony at the Community Federal Savings and Loan Association, with Nashville Mayor Ben West. The business was located at 2430 Jefferson Street in Nashville, Tennessee. The 1963 Nashville City Directory lists C. A. Rawls, President; A. C. Galloway, Executive Vice-President; H. D. West, H. T. Martin and W. S. Davis, Vice-Presidents; J. D. Martin, Secretary; A. G. Swett, Treasurer; Inman E. Otey, Manager; Mrs. Carolyn F. Riley Cashier. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974
